item.title: Accelerate istio-cni with ebpf
item.description: Datapath between envoy(sidecar) and service is an nonnegligible part in Istio, Isito-cni inserts iptables to intercept and redirect traffic between envoy and service, which brings costs like real TCP/IP traffic over loopback and has to insert IPTables rules. eBPF is a revolutionary technology that can run sandboxed programs in the Linux kernel without changing kernel source code or loading kernel modules.Replacing iptables with ebpf allows data traverse from Envoyâ€˜s inbound socket to its outbound socket directly,reducing datapath over loopback interface and sparing iptable rules.
